channel.title: CVE Feed for purethemes -- Listeo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for purethemes -- Listeo

item.title: CVE-2021-24318|2024-08-03T19:28:23.792Z -- purethemes -- listeo
item.description: The Listeo WordPress theme before 1.6.11 did not ensure that the Post/Page and Booking to delete belong to the user making the request, allowing any authenticated users to delete arbitrary page/post and booking via an IDOR vector.

item.title: CVE-2021-24317|2024-08-03T19:28:23.412Z -- purethemes -- listeo
item.description: The Listeo WordPress theme before 1.6.11 did not properly sanitise some parameters in its Search, Booking Confirmation and Personal Message pages, leading to Cross-Site Scripting issues
